ProductInfo.p_product_description: Duet 4.2-cu ft High-Efficiency Stackable Front-Load Washer (White) ENERGY STAR

Value: Adaptive wash technology senses the needs of each load and adapts wash actions so your clothes always look their best and colors stay vibrant wash after wash
Precision dispense holds detergent and additives and releases detergent at the correct time during the cycle for optimal fabric care
Up to 14 different adaptive wash actions provide a combination of powerful cleaning and gentle fabric care
Smooth wave stainless steel wash basket gently guides clothes through the wash cycle and helps protect fabrics from fraying and snags
ENERGY STAR® qualified - exceeds governement standards to help conserve natural resources and save money on your utility bills
